member.name: P:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.Encoder
member.summary: Gets or sets the encoder to use when escaping strings, or null to use the default encoder.

member.name: P:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.ReadCommentHandling
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that defines how comments are handled during deserialization.

member.name: P:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.PropertyNamingPolicy
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies the policy used to convert a property's name on an object to another format, such as camel-casing, or null to leave property names unchanged.

member.name: P:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.PropertyNameCaseInsensitive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether a property's name uses a case-insensitive comparison during deserialization. The default value is false.

member.name: P:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.NumberHandling
member.summary: Specifies how number types should be handled when serializing or deserializing.

member.name: P:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.MaxDepth
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum depth allowed when serializing or deserializing JSON, with the default value of 0 indicating a maximum depth of 64.

member.name: P:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.IncludeFields
member.summary: Determines whether fields are handled serialization and deserialization. The default value is false.

member.name: P:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.IgnoreReadOnlyProperties
member.summary: Gets a value that determines whether read-only properties are ignored during serialization. The default value is false.

member.name: P:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.IgnoreReadOnlyFields
member.summary: Determines whether read-only fields are ignored during serialization. A property is read-only if it isn't marked with the readonly keyword. The default value is false.

member.name: F:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.IgnoreNullValues
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether null values are ignored during serialization and deserialization. The default value is false.

member.name: P:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.DictionaryKeyPolicy
member.summary: Gets or sets the policy used to convert a System.Collections.IDictionary key's name to another format, such as camel-casing.

member.name: P:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.DefaultIgnoreCondition
member.summary: Specifies a condition to determine when properties with default values are ignored during serialization or deserialization. The default value is System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonIgnoreCondition.Never.

member.name: P:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.DefaultBufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the default buffer size, in bytes, to use when creating temporary buffers.

member.name: P:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.Converters
member.summary: Gets the list of user-defined converters that were registered.

member.name: P:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.AllowTrailingCommas
member.summary: Get or sets a value that indicates whether an extra comma at the end of a list of JSON values in an object or array is allowed (and ignored) within the JSON payload being deserialized.

member.name: P:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.ReferenceHandler
member.summary: Configures how object references are handled when reading and writing JSON.

member.name: P:EasyCaching.Serialization.SystemTextJson.Configurations.EasyCachingJsonSerializerOptions.WriteIndented
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that defines whether JSON should use pretty printing. By default, JSON is serialized without any extra white space.

member.summary: EasyCaching options extensions.
